contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox radio station | name = XHMW-FM | image = | city = [[Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas]] | area = [[Nuevo Laredo|Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas]]<br>[[Laredo, Texas]] | branding = Stereo Vida | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 102.3 FM | format = Spanish Contemporary Music | power = 2800 [[Watt]]s | erp = | class = A | coordinates = {{Coord|27.4935327|-99.515622|type:landmark_region:MX-TAM|display=inline,title}} | callsign_meaning = | former_callsigns = | owner = Radiorama Corporativo | webcast = [http://alt-87.com/radiorama/demo.php?idPlaza=53&lista=2&estacionId=XHMW listen live] | website = | affiliations = }} '''XHMW-FM''' (branded as Stereo Vida) is a Spanish Contemporary Music format FM station that serves the [[Laredo, Texas]], [[USA]] and [[Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas]], [[Mexico]] border area.<ref>[http://dgsrt.sct.gob.mx/index.php?id=448 SCT; infraestructura de estaciones de radio y televisiÃ³n comprende]</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.radiorama.com.mx/secciones.php?sec_id=32 Radiorama Corporativo] <br clear=all> {{Nuevo Laredo Radio}} [[Category:Latin rhythmic radio stations]] [[Category:Spanish-language radio stations]] [[Category:Radio stations in Nuevo Laredo]] [[Category:Radio stations in Laredo, Texas]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
